Performer:
Yoshida Tamaya (see also Yoshida Eikō) (吉田玉也)

Alternate Name: Yoshida Eikō (吉田栄光)

Dates: '1979/04-'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
